alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson and northwestern Taylor Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Woodville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Fanlew, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Cabbage Grove and Thomas City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor
